r","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256[5]","name":"","type":"uint256[5]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"balance","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"daysSinceStoragePaid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"storageFee","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"storageFeeGracePeriodDays","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"symbol","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"totalCirculation","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"totalSupply","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"transfer","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"transferFeeBasisPoints","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"value","type":"uint256"}],"name":"transferFrom","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"unbackedTreasury","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"unsetFeeExempt","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Cache Pte Ltd","methods":{"addBackedTokens(uint256)":{"details":"Function to add a certain amount of backed tokens. This will first take any tokens from the _unbackedTreasury address and move them to the _backedTreasury. Any remaining tokens will actually be minted. This operation will fail if there is not a sufficient supply of locked gold as determined by the LockedGoldOracle","params":{"value":"The amount of tokens to add to the backed treasury"},"return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.","params":{"owner":"address The address which owns the funds.","spender":"address The address which will spend the funds."},"return":"A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender. Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729","params":{"spender":"The address which will spend the funds.","value":"The amount of tokens to be spent."}},"backedTreasury()":{"return":"address for backed treasury"},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Gets the balance of the specified address deducting owed fees and accounting for the maximum amount that could be sent including transfer fee","params":{"owner":"The address to query the balance of."},"return":"An uint256 representing the amount sendable by the passed address including transaction and storage fees"},"balanceOfNoFees(address)":{"details":"Gets the balance of the specified address not deducting owed fees. this returns the 'traditional' ERC-20 balance that represents the balance currently stored in contract storage.","params":{"owner":"The address to query the balance of."},"return":"An uint256 representing the amount stored in passed address"},"calcInactiveFee(address)":{"details":"Calculate the current inactive fee for a given address","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A uint256 representing current inactive fees for the address"},"calcOwedFees(address)":{"details":"Returns the total number of fees owed on a particular address","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"The total storage and inactive fees owed on the address"},"calcSendAllBalance(address)":{"details":"Calculate the amount that would clear the balance from the address accounting for owed storage and transfer fees accounting for storage and transfer fees","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A uint256 representing total amount an address has available to send"},"calcStorageFee(address)":{"details":"Calculate the current storage fee owed for a given address","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A uint256 representing current storage fees for the address"},"constructor":{"details":"Contructor for the CacheGold token sets internal addresses","params":{"backedTreasury":"The address of the backed treasury","feeAddress":"The address where fees are collected","oracle":"The address of the LockedGoldOracle","redeemAddress":"The address where tokens are send to redeem physical gold","unbackedTreasury":"The address of the unbacked treasury"}},"daysSinceActivity(address)":{"details":"Get the days since the account last sent a transaction to the contract (activity)","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A uint256 representing the number of days since the address last had activity with the contract"},"daysSincePaidStorageFee(address)":{"details":"Get the number of days since the account last paid storage fees","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A uint256 representing the number of days since storage fees where last paid"},"decreaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Decrease the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed_[_spender] == 0. To decrement allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol Emits an Approval event.","params":{"spender":"The address which will spend the funds.","subtractedValue":"The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by."}},"feeAddress()":{"return":"address where fees are collected"},"feeEnforcer()":{"return":"address that can force paying overdue inactive fees"},"forcePayFees(address)":{"details":"Contract allows the forcible collection of storage fees on an address if it is has been more than than 365 days since the last time storage fees were paid on this address.  * Alternatively inactive fees may also be collected periodically on a prorated basis if the account is currently marked as inactive.","params":{"account":"The address to pay storage fees on"},"return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"increaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Increase the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed_[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol Emits an Approval event.","params":{"addedValue":"The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by.","spender":"The address which will spend the funds."}},"isAllFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Check if the address given is extempt from transfer fees","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A boolean if the address passed is exempt from transfer fees"},"isInactive(address)":{"details":"Check if the address is considered inactive for not having transacted with the contract for INACTIVE_THRESHOLD_DAYS","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A boolean if the address passed is considered inactive"},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"isStorageFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Check if the address given is extempt from storage fees","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A boolean if the address passed is exempt from storage fees"},"isTransferFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Check if the address given is extempt from transfer fees","params":{"account":"The address to check"},"return":"A boolean if the address passed is exempt from transfer fees"},"oracleAddress()":{"return":"address for oracle contract"},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"payStorageFee()":{"details":"Manually pay storage fees on senders address. Exchanges may want to periodically call this function to pay owed storage fees. This is a cheaper option than 'send to self', which would also trigger paying storage fees","return":"A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful."},"redeemAddress()":{"return":"address for redeeming tokens for gold bars"},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setBackedAddress(address)":{"details":"Set the address of backed treasury","params":{"newBackedAddress":"The address of backed treasury"},"return":"An bool representing successfully changing backed address"},"setFeeAddress(address)":{"details":"Set the address to collect fees","params":{"newFeeAddress":"The address to collect storage and transfer fees"},"return":"An bool representing successfully changing fee address"},"setFeeEnforcer(address)":{"details":"Set the address that can force collecting fees from users","params":{"enforcer":"The address to force collecting fees"},"return":"An bool representing successfully changing enforcer address"},"setFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Set this account as being exempt from all fees. This may be used in special circumstance for cold storage addresses owed by Cache, exchanges, etc.","params":{"account":"The account to exempt from storage and transfer fees"}},"setOracleAddress(address)":{"details":"Set the LockedGoldOracle address","params":{"oracleAddress":"The address for oracle"},"return":"An bool representing successfully changing oracle address"},"setRedeemAddress(address)":{"details":"Set the address to deposit tokens when redeeming for physical locked bars.","params":{"newRedeemAddress":"The address to redeem tokens for bars"},"return":"An bool representing successfully changing redeem address"},"setStorageFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Set this account as being exempt from storage fees. This may be used in special circumstance for cold storage addresses owed by Cache, exchanges, etc.","params":{"account":"The account to exempt from storage fees"}},"setStorageFeeGracePeriodDays(uint256)":{"details":"Set the number of days before storage fees begin accruing.","params":{"daysGracePeriod":"The global setting for the grace period before storage fees begin accruing. Note that calling this will not change the grace period for addresses already actively inside a grace period"}},"setTransferFeeBasisPoints(uint256)":{"details":"Set a new transfer fee in basis points, must be less than or equal to 10 basis points","params":{"fee":"The new transfer fee in basis points"}},"setTransferFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Set this account as being exempt from transfer fees. This may be used in special circumstance for cold storage addresses owed by Cache, exchanges, etc.","params":{"account":"The account to exempt from transfer fees"}},"setUnbackedAddress(address)":{"details":"Set the address to unbacked treasury","params":{"newUnbackedAddress":"The address of unbacked treasury"},"return":"An bool representing successfully changing unbacked address"},"simulateTransfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Simulate the transfer from one address to another see final balances and associated fees","params":{"from":"The address to transfer from.","to":"The address to transfer to.","value":"The amount to be transferred."},"return":"See _simulateTransfer function"},"storageFeeGracePeriodDays()":{"return":"the current number of days and address is exempt from storage fees upon receiving tokens"},"totalCirculation()":{"details":"Total number of tokens that are actually in circulation, which is total tokens excluding the unbacked treasury","return":"A uint256 representing the total number of tokens in circulation"},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Total number of tokens in existence. This includes tokens in the unbacked treasury that are essentially unusable and not in circulation","return":"A uint256 representing the total number of minted tokens"},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer token for a specified address","params":{"to":"The address to transfer to.","value":"The amount to be transferred."}},"transferFeeBasisPoints()":{"return":"the current transfer fee in basis points [0-10]"},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer tokens from one address to another. Note that while this function emits an Approval event, this is not required as per the specification, and other compliant implementations may not emit the event. Also note that even though balance requirements are not explicitly checked, any transfer attempt over the approved amount will automatically fail due to SafeMath revert when trying to subtract approval to a negative balance","params":{"from":"address The address which you want to send tokens from","to":"address The address which you want to transfer to","value":"uint256 the amount of tokens to be transferred"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"unbackedTreasury()":{"return":"address for unbacked treasury"},"unsetFeeExempt(address)":{"details":"Set account is no longer exempt from all fees","params":{"account":"The account to reactivate fees"}}},"title":"The CacheGold Token Contract"},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/conor/cache-contract/contracts/CacheGold.sol":"CacheGold"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/conor/cache-contract/contracts/CacheGold.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6b2778d839e3e1c34e4f797d21c993388705fef7dc6add773fd9bb0190923bdc","urls":["bzz-raw://24985b9c4d5122e60f019d677c0aae27501e382e4c915c4d93d0dd410e98fb0a","dweb:/ipfs/Qmc4RnoF3yYFEd2KFPY8QQN2ANWeFRCqqCfRMVPCGZHubQ"]},"/home/conor/cache-contract/contracts/LockedGoldOracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6d8fe09a2bfdf9899fda232effbfad6465765487a8d7d8e09e4dfd7e0b75b356","urls":["bzz-raw://31ba81df1df51d8646ba5606cf7bcf1c1c31668e3bd9596e8f769faa77b9f5db","dweb:/ipfs/QmcAN3Z7w3XYKpdCWT76C6psqqdw6QuAtjT752ZkjTfCTw"]},"/home/conor/cache-contract/node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ccf2d7b51873db1ccfd54ca2adae5eac3b184f9699911ed4490438419f1c690","urls":["bzz-raw://d62d769b2219d5de39013093412623e624fa887f871826ea3bae6052ee893610","dweb:/ipfs/QmV3yVktya1s617QmuzQR2CfuJgUi3dR2xEZY9ecmqZ2G1"]},"/home/conor/cache-contract/node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf79fb10e8235770eb4aea7249034076a3cc9f9119ad944fc48705bae9c9d20dc","urls":["bzz-raw://cd3429aa9a4878dcf6c73faa32c3722f4013d4be012ece543b246faa6b50f55c","dweb:/ipfs/QmS55hgTvNEAKinus19m65CB4wcymN8EiUPFpRx5tYJ1i2"]},"/home/conor/cache-contract/node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x90e8c2521653bbb1768b05889c5760031e688d9cd361f167489b89215e201b95","urls":["bzz-raw://d0abb99bb8bfc2bc0a89902b8ed1dc0442ad08cc78cee64c291b3df6a27bcccc","dweb:/ipfs/QmP5NaEwZthQeM2ESz4WTT3osrP7jhbvu7ocbttBi2JAw6"]}},"version":1}

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to add a certain amount of backed tokens. This will first
take any tokens from the _unbackedTreasury address and move them to the
_backedTreasury. Any remaining tokens will actually be minted.
This operation will fail if there is not a sufficient supply of locked gold
as determined by the LockedGoldOracle
  * @param value The amount of tokens to add to the backed treasury
@return A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: addBackedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Manually pay storage fees on senders address. Exchanges may want to
periodically call this function to pay owed storage fees. This is a
cheaper option than 'send to self', which would also trigger paying
storage fees
  * @return A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: payStorageFee

@dev Contract allows the forcible collection of storage fees on an address
if it is has been more than than 365 days since the last time storage fees
were paid on this address.
  * Alternatively inactive fees may also be collected periodically on a prorated
basis if the account is currently marked as inactive.
  * @param account The address to pay storage fees on
@return A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to add a certain amount of backed tokens. This will first
take any tokens from the _unbackedTreasury address and move them to the
_backedTreasury. Any remaining tokens will actually be minted.
This operation will fail if there is not a sufficient supply of locked gold
as determined by the LockedGoldOracle
  * @param value The amount of tokens to add to the backed treasury
@return A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: addBackedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Manually pay storage fees on senders address. Exchanges may want to
periodically call this function to pay owed storage fees. This is a
cheaper option than 'send to self', which would also trigger paying
storage fees
  * @return A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: payStorageFee

addBackedTokens(uint256).details: Function to add a certain amount of backed tokens. This will first take any tokens from the _unbackedTreasury address and move them to the _backedTreasury. Any remaining tokens will actually be minted. This operation will fail if there is not a sufficient supply of locked gold as determined by the LockedGoldOracle

params.value: The amount of tokens to add to the backed treasury

addBackedTokens(uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

allowance(address,address).details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params.owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params.spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender. Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address deducting owed fees and accounting for the maximum amount that could be sent including transfer fee

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount sendable by the passed address including transaction and storage fees

balanceOfNoFees(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address not deducting owed fees. this returns the 'traditional' ERC-20 balance that represents the balance currently stored in contract storage.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

balanceOfNoFees(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount stored in passed address

calcInactiveFee(address).details: Calculate the current inactive fee for a given address
calcInactiveFee(address).return: A uint256 representing current inactive fees for the address

calcOwedFees(address).details: Returns the total number of fees owed on a particular address
calcOwedFees(address).return: The total storage and inactive fees owed on the address

calcSendAllBalance(address).details: Calculate the amount that would clear the balance from the address accounting for owed storage and transfer fees accounting for storage and transfer fees
calcSendAllBalance(address).return: A uint256 representing total amount an address has available to send

calcStorageFee(address).details: Calculate the current storage fee owed for a given address
calcStorageFee(address).return: A uint256 representing current storage fees for the address

constructor.details: Contructor for the CacheGold token sets internal addresses

params.backedTreasury: The address of the backed treasury
params.feeAddress: The address where fees are collected
params.redeemAddress: The address where tokens are send to redeem physical gold
params.unbackedTreasury: The address of the unbacked treasury

daysSinceActivity(address).details: Get the days since the account last sent a transaction to the contract (activity)
daysSinceActivity(address).return: A uint256 representing the number of days since the address last had activity with the contract

daysSincePaidStorageFee(address).details: Get the number of days since the account last paid storage fees
daysSincePaidStorageFee(address).return: A uint256 representing the number of days since storage fees where last paid

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decrease the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed_[_spender] == 0. To decrement allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol Emits an Approval event.

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params.subtractedValue: The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by.

feeEnforcer().return: address that can force paying overdue inactive fees

forcePayFees(address).details: Contract allows the forcible collection of storage fees on an address if it is has been more than than 365 days since the last time storage fees were paid on this address.  * Alternatively inactive fees may also be collected periodically on a prorated basis if the account is currently marked as inactive.

params.account: The address to pay storage fees on

forcePayFees(address).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increase the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed_[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol Emits an Approval event.

params.addedValue: The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by.
params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.

isAllFeeExempt(address).details: Check if the address given is extempt from transfer fees
isAllFeeExempt(address).return: A boolean if the address passed is exempt from transfer fees

isInactive(address).details: Check if the address is considered inactive for not having transacted with the contract for INACTIVE_THRESHOLD_DAYS
isInactive(address).return: A boolean if the address passed is considered inactive

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

isStorageFeeExempt(address).details: Check if the address given is extempt from storage fees
isStorageFeeExempt(address).return: A boolean if the address passed is exempt from storage fees

isTransferFeeExempt(address).details: Check if the address given is extempt from transfer fees
isTransferFeeExempt(address).return: A boolean if the address passed is exempt from transfer fees

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payStorageFee().details: Manually pay storage fees on senders address. Exchanges may want to periodically call this function to pay owed storage fees. This is a cheaper option than 'send to self', which would also trigger paying storage fees
payStorageFee().return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

redeemAddress().return: address for redeeming tokens for gold bars

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBackedAddress(address).details: Set the address of backed treasury
setBackedAddress(address).return: An bool representing successfully changing backed address

setFeeAddress(address).details: Set the address to collect fees

params.newFeeAddress: The address to collect storage and transfer fees

setFeeAddress(address).return: An bool representing successfully changing fee address

setFeeEnforcer(address).details: Set the address that can force collecting fees from users

params.enforcer: The address to force collecting fees

setFeeEnforcer(address).return: An bool representing successfully changing enforcer address

setFeeExempt(address).details: Set this account as being exempt from all fees. This may be used in special circumstance for cold storage addresses owed by Cache, exchanges, etc.

params.account: The account to exempt from storage and transfer fees

setOracleAddress(address).return: An bool representing successfully changing oracle address

setRedeemAddress(address).details: Set the address to deposit tokens when redeeming for physical locked bars.

params.newRedeemAddress: The address to redeem tokens for bars

setRedeemAddress(address).return: An bool representing successfully changing redeem address

setStorageFeeExempt(address).details: Set this account as being exempt from storage fees. This may be used in special circumstance for cold storage addresses owed by Cache, exchanges, etc.

params.account: The account to exempt from storage fees

setStorageFeeGracePeriodDays(uint256).details: Set the number of days before storage fees begin accruing.

params.daysGracePeriod: The global setting for the grace period before storage fees begin accruing. Note that calling this will not change the grace period for addresses already actively inside a grace period

setTransferFeeBasisPoints(uint256).details: Set a new transfer fee in basis points, must be less than or equal to 10 basis points

params.fee: The new transfer fee in basis points

setTransferFeeExempt(address).details: Set this account as being exempt from transfer fees. This may be used in special circumstance for cold storage addresses owed by Cache, exchanges, etc.

params.account: The account to exempt from transfer fees

setUnbackedAddress(address).details: Set the address to unbacked treasury
setUnbackedAddress(address).return: An bool representing successfully changing unbacked address

simulateTransfer(address,address,uint256.details: Simulate the transfer from one address to another see final balances and associated fees

storageFeeGracePeriodDays().return: the current number of days and address is exempt from storage fees upon receiving tokens

totalCirculation().details: Total number of tokens that are actually in circulation, which is total tokens excluding the unbacked treasury
totalCirculation().return: A uint256 representing the total number of tokens in circulation

totalSupply().details: Total number of tokens in existence. This includes tokens in the unbacked treasury that are essentially unusable and not in circulation
totalSupply().return: A uint256 representing the total number of minted tokens

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfer token for a specified address

transferFeeBasisPoints().return: the current transfer fee in basis points [0-10]

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens from one address to another. Note that while this function emits an Approval event, this is not required as per the specification, and other compliant implementations may not emit the event. Also note that even though balance requirements are not explicitly checked, any transfer attempt over the approved amount will automatically fail due to SafeMath revert when trying to subtract approval to a negative balance

params.from: address The address which you want to send tokens from
params.to: address The address which you want to transfer to
params.value: uint256 the amount of tokens to be transferred

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unsetFeeExempt(address).details: Set account is no longer exempt from all fees
